title: Triple Barrier Method with Meta-Labeling
hypothesis: Using triple barrier labeling (vertical + horizontal barriers) with meta-labeling improves signal quality by filtering false positives from primary model
counterparty: Traders using fixed time exits miss optimal exit points
edgeSource: Academic research - De Prado's triple barrier provides better P&L alignment than fixed exits
source: De Prado 'Advances in Financial ML' Chapter 3
references: De Prado Chapter 3: Triple Barrier Method
